rows.label: qst200501_0010
rows.name:
What is it you hope to achieve
with this fire, Yuou?

rows.label: qst200501_0030
rows.name: To burn the stuff we've collected, of course!

rows.label: qst200501_0040
rows.name: Seems a bit of a waste to burn all of this...

rows.label: qst200501_0070
rows.name:
Aligo are attracted by smells you know.
It's a funny thing.

rows.label: qst200501_0080
rows.name: If we make skillful use of this, we can get them to come over here...

rows.label: qst200501_0100
rows.name:
Indeed, the things that we gathered
earlier are giving off a certain odor.

rows.label: qst200501_0110
rows.name:
If the smell starts to waft over their way,
they'll probably come over this way.

rows.label: qst200501_0120
rows.name:
If we play it right, we can collect up the
cargo without having to fight them.

rows.label: qst200501_0130
rows.name: Meh... That really enough to bring them?

rows.label: qst200501_0140
rows.name: It's fine, it's fine. I know what I'm doing.

rows.label: qst200501_0150
rows.name:
Now, let's find a good vantage point
to watch the action unfold!

rows.label: qst200501_0170
rows.name:
Well, maybe we didn't get all of them.
But it'll be a lot easier to collect what we need now.

rows.label: qst200501_0180
rows.name:
Wow!
Yuou a very dependable chap!

rows.label: qst200501_0190
rows.name:
Well, thanks!
But y'know, I'm just doing my regular thing!
